#summary A set of functions for CameraControlSystem closest to target camera.

=== Overview ===
A closest to target camera's position is chosen to be the closest to the target of a given list. The camera orientation is fixed by a yaw axis. 
<BR>
<BR>
<BR>
=== !AddClosestToTargetCameraPosition(double camera_mode_ptr, double x, double y, double z) ===
----
====Parameters====
   * _camera_id_ - The ID of the camera control system camera object.
